Uses of AbstractRegexFilter in etc.aloe.filters
 

Subclasses of AbstractRegexFilter in etc.aloe.filters
 class PronounRegexFilter
          A filter that searches for occurrences of known pronouns, in several categories.
 class PunctuationRegexFilter
          Filter that searches for occurrences of punctuation characters.
 class SpecialRegexFilter
          Filter that searches for occurrences of special strings (negations, names, and swearing)
 class SpellingRegexFilter
          Filter that looks for occurrences of certain words and spelling variations.
